creator: Anker
descriptionHtml:
Nebula Connect works together with your Nebula smart projectors. It can seamlessly control your projector with the touchpad, virtual keyboard, and functional buttons. No worries if you forget bringing the remote control, everything can be on the go with the Nebula Connect!

Feel free to contact us at support@seenebula.com if you need help.
descriptionShort: A simple tool to connect and control your Nebula smart projector.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Add Nebula Kids,Cosmos And Cosmos Max support.

2. Bug fixed and performance improved.

title:
Nebula Connect
3.6.0

creator: Anker
descriptionHtml:
Nebula Connect works together with your Nebula smart projectors. It can seamlessly control your projector with the touchpad, virtual keyboard, and functional buttons. No worries if you forget bringing the remote control, everything can be on the go with the Nebula Connect!

Feel free to contact us at support@seenebula.com if you need help.
descriptionShort: A simple tool to connect and control your Nebula smart projector.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.New Feature: Projector Warranty Card is now available in the app. You can easily process returns or exchanges directly through Nebula Connect. Simply authorize your device via the "E-Warranty Card" menu option.
2.Fixed known issues and optimized user experience.
